thread.title: Sean Rodriguez offers best apology ever in cooler attack
thread.title_full: Sean Rodriguez offers best apology ever in cooler attack

title: Sean Rodriguez offers best apology ever in cooler attack
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Sean Rodriguez offers best apology ever in cooler attack The Pirates’ Sean Rodriguez was ejected from the Wild Card game on Wednesday night, and took his anger out on a Gatorade cooler, which he beat up pretty bad. Post to Facebook Sean Rodriguez offers best apology ever in cooler attack The Pirates’ Sean Rodriguez was ejected from the Wild Card game on Wednesday night, and took his anger out on a Gatorade cooler, which he beat up pretty bad. (Photo: Cork Gaines, Vine) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Pirates’ Sean Rodriguez was ejected from the Wild Card game on Wednesday night, and took his anger out on a Gatorade cooler, which he beat up pretty bad.
